description:
The idol hopefuls, now settled into the dorm, split into three teams to go head-to-head in the first round. Suzune`s partner doesn`t seem that interested in working with her, though...
Source: Funimation

titles.title: If Singing Vanished from the World
Moshi Kono Sekai kara Uta ga Kietara
もしこの世界から歌が消えたら
